body:
Comment 1: 
Sorry, tip is currently broken for armv5 devices due to a change in the linker.

You could try the set of CLs proposed by Elias Naur.

https://golang.org/cl/55540044/
https://golang.org/cl/57000043/

Review feedback would assist in merging this proposals.
_Labels changed: added **release-go1.3**, **repo-main**, **arch-arm**._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
